name: Ocean Drive Challenge Remastered
description:
Remaster of the Xbox Live Arcade Game. Remastered for Steam due to popular demand.

Classic retro arcade racing game in a flashy 80's look. The race course combines the most stunning landscapes of the world and gives you some marvellous views. Choose all characters and see how their personal stories unwind and intertwine. Listen to great music and enjoy the ride!

"Ocean Drive Challenge, in its own way, slowly advance the genre a little further. And boy, does it look good doing it."

"It’s a move away from realism, and a move towards awesome-ism!"

"[...] the music is outstanding."
